knimeNode.name: Secured WebHDFS Connection
knimeNode.shortDescription: Configures the connection information used to connect to a Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS) via SSL encrypted WebHDFS.

fullDescription.intro:
This node configures the connection information that will be used to connect encrypted to a remote host.
SSL configurations can be done in global preferences (KNIME > Big Data Extension > Hadoop)
fullDescription.option:
Method of authentication.
User
user name based authentication.
Kerberos
Kerberos ticket based authentication.
Use workflow credentials to determine user.
Name of the user. Optional for Kerberos authentication.
Open dialog that test the current connection.

ports.outPort: Port object containing the SWebHDFS connection information.
